sentence.Network_en: This paper introduces the technology characteristics of cristobalite produced by direct calcination with nubby quartz.
sentence.Network_cn: 阐述了石英块料直接煅烧法生产加工方石英的工艺特点.

sentence.Network_en: However, the biosilica obtained by the dry ashing method from rice shells directly is cristobalite silica.
sentence.Network_cn: 而利用干灰化法从稻壳中直接提取的硅质体是方晶石型的SiO2材料.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: named after Cerro San Cristóbal in Mexico, where it was discovered, + -ite

means.word_mean: 1. a white mineral consisting of silica; found in volcanic rocks
